name: Tingle Defense
description:
A game where you carefully guide Tingles back to their homes.

Unfortunately the gameplay is tedious and underwhelming due to over-ambition. The game is janky and buggy, but at least I finished something in time for the jam. Corners had to be cut and rushed, the logo for example, but the whole game is a little crummy at the moment.

Made for the MFGG Winter Fangame Jam.

Sprites, music and game by XxCallOfDutyFanPro2009XxX
